TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed LoadHint extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the preferred default binding for a dependent assembly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this enumeration with the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DependencyAttribute> attribute and the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DefaultDependencyAttribute> attribute to specify the preferred default binding for a dependent assembly.
Note that the `Default` value directs the native generation service to consult the dependent assembly for its preferred default binding, which is specified using the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DefaultDependencyAttribute> attribute. Very few assemblies should need to specify a default value in this manner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint Always = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint Default = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.CompilerServices.LoadHint Sometimes = int32(2)
